name: Dreams or nightmare
description:
" Dear Diary,  

I have made some strange dreams during all the week. My mom said that I looked sick, dead, lost.

Every morning I wake up and I feel like I need to draw some strange animals, creatures. 

I dont know what it is but I  can see them in my dreams.  

Now, my eyes are closing and I feel asleep. But if I close my eyes, they will come back!"

Link of the game

https://mauriziorigamonti.ch/nightmare

Controls

Use Arrows or joystick

Game jam

Lvl up n.7

Thematic

From dreams to nightmare

Constraints 

Retro, Story driven

Bugs

The speed of the character is too fast

Team

WE HOPE YOU die, KILL yourself THE GAME !!!
